content: Pretty fun!

Occasionally it doesn't allow us to pick a piece we can afford and have room for. Sometimes also let's me pick a piece that I can't place. Had a game where got both on the same turn, could buy and place the third piece but it only let me pick the first one which wouldn't fit on the quilt, had to pass and lost a lot of time.
Nice game, but the UI isn't great and the load times are extremely long

I like this app, but except for the tutorial booth games I've played resulted in a game freeze. I try to move my piece to my quilt and the game gets stuck. I can click on most things, e.g. my opponent's stats, options, etc., but I can't continue with the game. Please fix this--i would like to finish at least one game!
Excellent app and excellent game
Amazing just as fun as playing the game in real life

Too buggy still, three games today I played against my sister today just disappeared, in all three I was about to win. Very frustrating. Should make the game free maybe till all the bugs are sorted out
replyContent: Hi Gerhard, aer you still encountering these bugs?

content: Randomly glitches and my chosen piece just sits there and nothing can be done. Have to reset the game. Has happened about every 5th game. I'm over it, very frustrating.
A n excellent port of a fantastic 2 player boardgame. AI is very tough opponent. Great game.
Darn near perfect, would only like the ability to have different character portraits during pass and play. Wonderful game for me and my wife!
Very relaxing game, with a surprising amount of replayability. Very satisfying
Anytime I tried to play a ranked game (the only form of PvP I could access) it would glitch within the first 2 moves causing the game to disappear. I'd get a notification later saying I lost.
My husband and I love it!

Game lacks rules or detailed gameplay explanation. I want to like this game. Beautiful artwork and interesting concept. But when playing against the AI, the AI can skip to new tiles with no apparent rhyme or reason. This makes planning ahead very difficult and just feels like the computer is cheating. The app fails to explain this at all. From the original board game rules, there is also no reason for this.
HOW THE HELL DO YOU PLAY WITH PEOPLE?! I CAN ADD PEOPLE AS FRIENDS BUT THERE IS NO WAY TO ACTUALLY PLAY WITH THEM WHAT THE HELL?!
This is a great game and the hard mode is very hard a great challenge.
Love this game very relaxing.

I love Patchwork the board game so it wasnt even a choice to download this. It's just the same and just as much fun. My fiancee and I must be terrible at it though (we have only ever played it with each other) because he cant manage to beat the AI on easy and I have failed to win against it several times on medium. The only issue I have other than that is that the AI takes a while to do their turn and there's no way to speed it up or skip it.

It is a really fun game, but I keep experiencing glitches when I play locally against the cpu. Every second or third game it freezes half way through and refuses to let me place pieces and I have to re start the app.
A wonderful different type of game. I am enjoying it. For now I have to choose easy until I learn it better.
Loving the game but it refuses to connect properly. I have done everything suggested and still it won't connect to Google Play so that I can play ranked games or casual games.
Won't connect to Google Play Games no matter what I try and so I can't play with my friend, which was the whole reason I downloaded this $4 game.

As soon as I try to access the account / online section, the app log me in my account and automatically closes the app preventing me from playing online (which was the main reason I bought the game). Great game, big issues for the online functions, not working.
Great game but on all of my and my wife's devices Google play won't log in, so we can't play against each other
Twice now the game has got stuck after I selected a piece. Can't place it and the game has to be be exited, infuriating! Both times it happened when I was doing well. Also the AI is stupidly hard.
Fun game and excellent translation to an app.
Love the board game. Can't think of any way this port could be improved. Impressive UI.

Fun strategy game with great replay value. Sometimes the app takes a very long to connect to the servers for ranked play. There are occasional glitches with pieces not displaying properly, and a crash here and there. ELO decay could be nice as well, as it appears that many of the highest ranked players are no longer active. That said, would recommend! Well worth the asking price.
Tried to like it, but just not that fun. Wish i could have tried it first or get a refund.
Great rendition of the board game and the ai is actually incredibly challenging.
This is a great digital version of a great game that is a family favorite. Right now I can't login with Google play. Please fix so I can enjoy playing with family again.

The game mechanic is great. Port from board game to mobile is also very sleek. For beginners it is a bit difficult to tell the size of few pieces, like a long straight piece. So if the pieces had light grids on them, it would make it easy to see their size.
replyContent: Thank you for your feedback! It is always interesting to get this kind of feedback to help us improve the game. Best

content: I love everything about this but game won't log into Google Play account and game is cropped on Pixel 4 XL
I have the game, so practising on my phone is very handy.
Great game
A nice, light mobile port from board game. I enjoy playing heavy games quite a bit, but this is the light one I play in between - and from time to time, instead of - those heavier games.
Great Mobile adaptation to the point of surpassing playability of the physical board game. Asynchronous at its best.
plays smooth. strategic choices. But for me, the background graphics while cute and pleasant are too busy and distracting.
classical game

Paid for the app.. can't play online/ranked games. Keeps saying Auth failed... and that I need to clear cache or restart app for Google play.. .. otherwise single player seems to be ok. Yes I have tried restarting the app and clearing cache on all apps. Uninstalling and reinstalling has seemed to fix the issue. changing my rating up a star.

This is a well implemented digital adaptation of the two-player boardgame. The AI are decent. As much as I would like to love this game, I can't help but find its gameplay dull. For a very similar (polyomino game by the same author) but more enjoyable experience, I would definitely recommend Cottage Garden or Indian Summer.
constantly freezes after 1st turn.
Great implementation of this game. I am learning so much more about the decisions to be made vs the tabletop game.

Excellent fun game, and enjoyable to play against the AI on easy or medium level. Unfortunately at the hard level, the AI has been given an unnecessary and excruciatingly slow "thinking time". This adds nothing to the game and seriously detracts from the game play. I've given up playing at hard because it is so frustrating waiting for the AI to move, and since a computer thinks in nanoseconds, there is absolutely no need for it.

The game is great. I love it and the boardgame. However recently it's been glitchy, our buttons currency changes randomly between turns and available pieces disappear from the board. The turn piece has shown up on our quilts and then no pieces are highlighted available to select. I've had some luck going to the settings and reselecting our game to play to make the pieces all reappear but it has changed our button currency after that. I hope an update can fix these glitches-it's our kids favorite
Great game for 2 people. Strongly considered picking up the physical copy of this, but we are more than happy with the digital version. Also makes counting up your score much easier!
Awesome game
Fantastic!
works great.
love the game. challenging and fun. would like more backgrounds, especially right now at the holidays
We ALL at homeüçïüçïüçîhere luv to play this game. All of us even the 5 year old one play's till it is time to go to sleep....try it........üòâüòâüòÄüçäüçíüçî
good

Fun fit-the-Tetris-style-pieces into a board style game. Local multiplayer is great, wish there were more options to set names and pics for local play. I found the tutorial kind of confusing but after watching a YouTube video the rules were clear.
Great game but unable to log in to Google play clearing cache didn't help
A great Digital rendition of the tabletop game.

I enjoy many things about this game but it is very frustrating that most times I achieve a 7*7 complete block i do not get awarded the 7 point bonus. I have submitted a notification through the app, and have saved some game replays to show this happening, but still not heard from the developers. I would prob give 5 stars otherwise but this is super annoying bug that is affecting my ranking.
replyContent:
Hello, 

please make sure you get the 7x7 bonus first. Only the first player to fill 7x7 can achieve this. Thanks!

content: Love the game, but is somewhat buggy. My biggest problem currently is that since I switched phones I don't get notifications when an opponent takes their turn.
replyContent:
Hello,

Many thanks for your feedback,
Please let us know about the issue on: https://asmodee.helpshift.com/a/patchwork/ 

Best regards, 
Asmodee Digital support

content:
New to the game. Am enjoying playing the mobile version, but NONE of the 
DLC new quilt themes I bought work. üòí Have no idea who to contact to get a 
refund.
replyContent:
Hi, 

We're very sorry about that. Please let us know about the issue on : https://asmodee.helpshift.com/a/patchwork/ 

Best regards,

Asmodee Digital support

content: Awesome game with family and friends
replyContent:
Hi Brent !

We are very pleased to see that you are enjoying the game! Have fun :)

Asmodee Digital Support

content: YAY

I love this app! My only complaint is that the "hard" AI player (Uwe) takes 
FOREVER to play its turns. Honestly, it's a computer. Why is this so 
slow?No one I know in real life has such a bad case of analysis paralysis. 
I can make coffee while waiting for the AI to take its turns. Granted, I 
have a Keurig, but still. Other than this annoyance, I enjoy the game's 
digital variation quite a bit.
replyContent:
Hi Christy, thank you for your feedback! We will alert our developers about the issue. Hope you still have fun!

Best,

Asmodee Digital Support

content: It a great for the train

First install Google Play and get an account, then install this one. Nice 
game.
Fun tile placing strategy game

This is a game I've been playing for awhile. I really enjoy it. Other then 
the occasional glitch, where it doesn't highlight a piece I could place, 
it's worked for me.

Was a great game now its buggy. Halfway through the game the third tile is 
no longer selectable or even highlighted. Not to mention app will not let 
me report bugs. As it will not connect to authentication server.

Great boardgame and a very good digital conversion of it. The only problem 
is that I have changed to a new phone and tablet and when I enter the game, 
I get a new account and not the old one that is the one that appears in my 
Google games with all my achievements. My old account appears when I look 
for my player name, why am I not able to log in to it?

Extremely fun and relaxing game! It's competitive but you don't really feel like you are competing. You just want to make the best quilt and no one is going to stand in your way!! Very fun game with challenging AI. Play it now!
Tetris the board game but on a phone/tablet not as much fun as Tetris. I'd get that instead.
Really well done. Fun and engaging interface.
Great game and UI.
Get an error message, when trying to log in with Google Play Games: "Could not get AuthCode". Updated both apps and cleared their caches - without success. Can't play with others now.. :¬∞(
Great game but has an annoying glitch when placing a patch shape on the board, it doesn't zoom in and just stays there. After that you're stuck until you reset the game. Please fix!

This is a beautiful app and a brilliant game.    I have the app for Cottage Garden as well.  To me, Patchwork is more thinky than Cottage Garden because you have to figure out how to make money (buttons) and there are additional decisions to be made with the timeline.  I find Cottage Garden to be more relaxing but also more satisfying, because I'm able to complete several beautiful flower beds, but in Patchwork, I find it impossible to complete a single quilt.  I'm definitely happy that I purchased both apps.  The game that I choose will depend on my mood of the moment.
I love the game, and the graphics are great, but the app is kind of buggy and clunky. The loading between games is slow, as well as updating and general loading.
Brilliant game. Simple idea but so much depth and fun. Difficulty levels are perfectly pitched. A masterpiece of gaming
Developers promptly fixed login issues I was having initially, no complaints now. Have the physical version of this game as well, and love playing both equally!
replyContent:
Hello Greg, 

thank you for your feedback. Sometimes Google Play Games is not up to date or the cache of the device is not properly cleaned.
Please have a look at out FAQ, so you can enjoy Patchwork again. 

FAQs:
http://digidiced.com/faqs/

content: Doesn't work on Android, logging in to Google Play fails.
replyContent: Hi David, please write us to support@digidiced.com if your problem still exists.

content: The hard mode AI seems to very good! Way better and smarter than previous one. Well done developers!
Perfect apart from occasionally glitching and requiring a restart.
My go to game
Way too addictive
Great implementation.  I noticed in one of my games the pieces are different, new patterns, will that be in all the games now?
My husband and I love the board game version of this game and I find this a great way for me to get practice so I can beat him better. ‚ò∫Ô∏è
This installed fine on my Samsung Galaxy S6 Edge Plus, but I get a 505 error on my Samsung Galaxy Tab S2. I tried clearing cache, etc. Other apps installed, but not this one.

Game used to work great, now I can't use online play anymore, when I try I get the error: Login Error, Google Auth error, cancelled, tried removing and reinstating my Google account, tried reinstalling the app, nothing works
replyContent: Hi Ed Costello, please write us to support@digidiced.com if the problem still exists. Thanks and sorry for any inconvenience.

content: Superb game: simple to play, yet deep and complex to master. And the new AI is excellent! It's the very cherry on top of it. 5 stars well deserved
Great game. Very good adaptation of the board game. Would give it 5 but it kills my battery & makes my phone hot!
Great implementation of an excellent two player game.

Played the board game and loved it, the app is just as great!  I would like to join ranked games but I'm not going to create a google+ account for it so that's really a bummer. I usually just do a pass and play game or play against the AI

Great game with some notable problems.  I've lost numerous games in which the app said I ran out of time, but the timer had up to 30 seconds remaining. I.e. there seems to be some kind of sync problem. There is also a design flaw, in my view. Why should the game allow a player to force forfeiture? Just force them to pass. That would be enough. Fix those for 5 stars!
Great!

Great game but I just wish that the AI was a bit stronger.  UPDATE: The new AI is super tough!  It has given me a lot more respect for this game.  I don't mind the slowness.  Still faster than a human. (Usually)
Can be very addictive. I love it.
The random piece color is annoying.

Brilliant tile-laying game with lots to think about. Little Uwe is tough to beat! Not crazy about the jumpy graphics, and a key to the scoreboard would be helpful for beginners, together with a better explanation of how the queue works.

I used to really enjoy this game. But ever since the latest update, I've had nothing but problems. The AI is now super slow, which is very frustrating. Also, I try to play against the AI and I constantly get the error message "you must first update your client to play online." This is super frustrating because I'm not trying to play online. I'm trying to play vs the AI. Honestly, I liked the old version better even if it was not as tough to beat.
replyContent: Hi, we have to enforce updates from time to time, as users with old versions can mess up gamestates quite a bit. The new AI is tougher and needs much more time to calculate. That said we will be implementing the faster AIs as well, so you have the choice how to play. Cheers

content: Patchwork: If Tetris Was A Board Game For Old Ladies: The Game. I love cooking up strategies and each game is a lot of fun. Removing the scrolling on the current games list and adding a rematch option would make it 5 stars. Digidiced has consistently followed up on the multiple bug reports they received from me via Google Play Ratings.
replyContent: Cheers, thank you for your review! Rematch would only work for casual games as in ranked games it could lead to exploits. I'll write it on our wall of things we could look into. :)

content: Since the August 2017 update, the AI plays only in s-l-o-w or e-x-t-r-a s-l-o-w mode which is f-r-u-s-t-r-a-t-i-n-g üòû
New AI on my Android is really slow and the game locks up. What's going on?
replyContent: The AI is slower because it got upgraded to be super tough to beat. We will implement the old AIs again as many users request a faster gameplay.

content: Great implementation though the buggy lock ups are frustrating
It's fun and looks gorgeous but it's laboriously slowed down by a few UI bugs
replyContent: Hi Arianne, thank you for your feedback. Can you please be more specific, which UI bugs you mean? You can write an email to support@digidiced.com or reach us via the ingame bug report tool. (Little cog wheel -> bug bubble). Thank you for your help!

content: I'm refunding the game since if won't let me and a friend add each other
replyContent: Hi Chris, why exactly can you not add your friend? We want to help you, please contact support@digidiced.com.

content: For such a beautifully simple game this app seems to "heavy". It overheats my phone, it "loses" connection, especially mobile data , which makes it impossible to play live. Dissapointing technical issues.
One of my favourite games; sweet and simple, quick, but replayable
Game is fantastic when it works. It drops about half my ranked games due to "network error". The game owes internet connection but my tablet does not.
replyContent: Hello Adam, can you try to deinstall and reinstall the game completely (no worries - your games are saved on the server as well). It sounds like a faulty update.

content: Brilliant implementation of one of my favourite 2 player board games. I love the asynchronous multiplayer. The only criticism is that I'd prefer it to be easier to see the pieces that are coming up without having to swipe through them.
Great, but it is needed to improve AI level (it is too easy to win on "hard" level).

This game is exactly how you'd want a mobile version of this brilliant board game to be handled, and you'll absolutely love it, no joke.  You'll find plenty of technical issues,  but none will detract too much from the experience. My girlfriend and I have been playing it for months, across platforms (iOS and Android), asynchronously, and while humming the terrific music to each other.  We have the physical game too,  and bust it out once in a while for a change,  but mostly we're here, in the app, making each other smile every time a notification pops up telling us it's our turn.  Now if only I could get her interested in the much more daunting gameplay of these devs' Terra Mystica adaptation...
A terrific adaptation of a terrific game.

Great adaptation, three things that need attention though: Drains battery like crazy for such a simple game. No idea why it's working my phone so hard.  Achievements aren't unlocking... Get them, shows in game tracker, Google Play has me at 0/11 Player board gets stuck on screen, while time trackers get moved when you make a move that causes auto-passes that end the game.
perfect, do cottage garden next xx
replyContent: Thank you for your kind words. :)

content: Couple of crashes, and wish I could save a game.... Otherwise perfect.
replyContent: Hi Darrell, all games are saved automatically. You can find them in the running games on the right side. Cheers!

content: Love this game and well designed app!
Only issue is battery drain. But other than that, Best Game Ever!!!!!
Super awesome addictive
Great game. Simple to learn, plays fast.

Great way to play a fun little boardgame however the latest version drains battery like crazy when active and is prone to constant crashing when used. Could also do with a way to bulk clear old games out as the menu runs very sluggishly when trying to get to active games.
replyContent: Hello Matthew, can you have a look at the new version? Thank you. :)

content: Amazing port! Great after a long day's work with my girlfriend.

Latest update is awful.  Inability to save replays.  Crashes when switching from one in progress game to another. Update: Got fed up.  Completely uninstalled app.  Rebooted.  Reinstalled latest version.  It automatically logged  in with my Google play account.  All my saved games and rank are there and the crashing stopped.  If having problems I recommend a full  reinstall.
replyContent: Thank you for this information. That is really weird. Probably a faulty update problem. We will have a look. Cheers

content: Solid little board game turned into a solid app.
The latest update on April 21 is very buggy and the app crashes/shuts down randomly when new games against other opponents are launched.
replyContent: Hello Kan. Can you try to completely reinstall the App. Another user brought this to our attention. Your running games will not be lost. Please let us know, if the crashes stopped.

content: Great adaptation
Plays just like the boardgame! Very fun! Only gripe is getting 1x1 patches on the quilt can be annoying.

Absolutely fantastic translation of one of my favourite board games into app form. The controls are straight forward and intuitive, the AIs actually give you a challenge, and the different themes are very charming.
Love this game, just beat the computer on hard setting. Love the fact it can be played on on a straightforward simple level as well as on a strategic level.
Plays like the excellent boardgame
Digital version is great. Sadly the board game version I have manufacturing issues where many of the pieces are unevenly cut and don't fit.
So fun

Cute game and very true to the board game. Only complaint is the "drag and drop" is a little off. When dragging single pieces to the quilt board it is especially noticeable, your finger is an inch below the piece. But still very playable and very fun!
Such an amazing digital adaptation of the game. Absolute love it!
Excellent version of the board game.

I don't have even one tiny complaint. Love the graphics, game play and the choices you have to play against 3 different levels of AIs, locally with a friend or join an online game (or several). Also love that you can play multiple games at once. Love it ‚ô°
replyContent: Hi Cheryl - thank you!

content: A very good implementation of a fun boardgame
Well designed port of the board game.
Great game... better play than the cardboard version.
I own the boardgame version, but the app is a nice addition!
Great game ... Great design ... Addicting
Great game but it glitches sometimes
Great game except for glitch where I can't complete final move of the game
Great game.
Good boardgame :) And pretty good and attentive support :)
We also have the boardgame, but playing the app is just as much fun.
Excellent adaptation of a terrific game.
Excellent version of the board game.

Fantastic game. Was interested in picking up this boardgame and saw it had an app. Decided to grab it for a few bucks to try it out. Played a few games and immediately had to go buy the physical boardgame cause I liked it.
One of the best board game apps. Never had any issues at all. Excellent.
I bought the physical game and loved it. Now if no one wants to play, I can play solo.

It has glitches that can be annoying. One person in my friends list has disappeared three separate times and I have to 'friend' her again to continue to play. My character piece almost always changes to the default one. But the game is still fun. I enjoy playing it.
Great game, unfortunately it turns my phone into a little heater. Pandemic seems to be the only board game adaptation to figure out how to not do this.
replyContent: Hello Joe, thank you for your feedback. We do not have this issue here with our test devices. Can you tell us which device you are using? You can also choose a less graphic intense theme (classic) and turn off the HD option to lessen the impact on you graphics chip. Hope that helps to keep your phone cool.

content: Great implementation of an excellent board game! My wife and I love to play it together. I have had an occasional minor glitch, but nothing that has affected my enjoyment of the game.

Still trying to understand the scoring because there are a lot of variables at play, but the comp does it in a way that is easy to notice patterns, so it ends up being a fun aspect of the game.  Thought of buying the board game on Amazon and the app is helping me to decide! Will buy for my mum who isn't so tech savvy - the app and the board game both. Its a relaxing game with adorable and complex graphics, but not too busy. Music is a bit busy (so loads of stimulation) but the sound effects are great. Also glad that the game isn't one that you finish and then don't want to restart because you've "been there and done that" as is the case with many games that have different levels. loads of game play. Have only tried the local game with myself as the competitor, which is an awesome feature. :) Thanks for the app!
Twice now I've encountered a game-breaking glitch after selecting a piece.
replyContent: Hello Josh, thank you for your comment. Could you please send us an in game bug report so we may find the issue? In the game with the problem, go into options and tap on the bug bubble. Please tell us exactly what happened and why it is game breaking. We really like to help.

content: It's a fun game that involves more strategy than you would first think. I almost always have 4-5 games going at any given time. The last update, however, broke the speed of the game. Everything now moves at breakneck speeds (regular or short-time games), which takes away some of the enjoyment. I hope they fix that soon.

My only minor complaint is that you always go first against the computer. Sounds like a minor complaint, but would feel more realistic if it was random, or there was an option to select. Other than that it's honestly one of my favorite mobile games ever
A great reconstruction of the board game perfect for playing where you can't put all the pieces out!
A very well implemented version of a wonderfully designed two player board game. Simple in premise, yet provides a nice amount of challenge to obtain a good score and win the game.
Great game.
Cute and fun!

I was in the middle of 10-15 ranked games and all the games were forfeited because I took too long to take my turn!  I invested a lot of time in those games and now they're all gone.  Grrr!  Also I want an option to turn off the stupid little animations.  They take forever and I can just feel them eating through my battery...   Uninstall...
replyContent: Hello Kristopher, thank you for your feedback. We changed the animations. In fast ranked games they are automatically off. You can also turn the HD option off in the main menu and choose a free classic theme without animations.

content: Fun  game in person and now the digital version.
One of my favorite boardgames right here on my phone. I'm in heaven!
Great
Awesome game
Extremely simple but still fun game.
I love this board game and this app is just as good. Highly recommended.

EDIT: I received good suggestions from the developers to reduce battery use. --- I play this game with my girlfriend in carboard format. The mobile app implementation is too colorful and distracting but mainly it east through my battery in no time. I can play maybe 6 quick games on a full battery on my very new samsung s5. Nothing comes close to making my phone that hot. I will fix this rating if power consumption improves.
replyContent: Hi Eric, did you try turning off HD settings in the options and also using the classic set (free) in the DLC section? This takes away the animations and should improve battery life. On our test devices we do not have the battery drain problem though.

content: I actually enjoy this over the real board game... Specially love the multiple online games you can play in parallel
Very adictive. great game!
Love it. Just like the board game. AI could be better.
Really lovely game - simple to learn but lots more to think about than you might imagine!
Once you've played a few times, it's kind of repetitive.
A lot of fun.  I'm still confused on how to play but I'm getting there üòÄ

Game typically freezes after scrolling ahead to preview multiple pieces. I have to back up to the main menu, re-click on the game, and wait through the replay before it will allow me to select my piece. This causes a significant time problem in the 3 min game. Also, the timer counts down from 20:00 in the 3 min game. Very confusing! The game is a lot of fun. Looking forward to seeing the bugs worked out!
Relaxing game
replyContent: We are sorry for the update problems. Should be fixed today.

content: Fun little strategy game, but I can't play with my friend on iOS.
replyContent: Thank you!

content: Makes you want to try the cardboard version 8)
replyContent: We agree. Try the real board game as well! :)

content: Love this game. Great controls, easy to use interface.
replyContent: Thank you very much!

content: Great game. Just as good as the tabletop version.
replyContent: Thank you! :)

content: This is a great game. My sister told me about it after playing it at a con.  I like the mechanics of the game a lot. Very strategic while also being very simple rule set. Quick to play and replay. The tutorial wasn't the best,  since I had to go look up the rulebook online to understand some of the nuances,  but oh well...the game itself is definitely worth the price.
replyContent: Thank you!

content: Fun
replyContent: That's what we are aiming for. :)

content: I have the board game, but this is awesome for playing with friends online. Love it
replyContent: Thank you!

content: Great conversion of the board game. Well worth ¬£2.50. üëåüëçüòÄ
Still loving it.
Addictively enjoyable
I love the physical game, and this is a great version I can take with me. Developers are quick to respond to issues, which is why I am updating this review.
replyContent: Seems its working now :)

content: Great version of the board game. Tons of fun and very addictive. Slowly becoming my go to game.
So much so I'm getting a physical copy to play.
perfect implementation of an amazing game
Would change to 5 stars if there will be an option for time limit of 3 mins or so...  In addition to the 24 hours :/
Nope... still not fixed. I can't see anything.  :(
replyContent: Hi, what exactly do you mean by you cannot see anything? Which device are you using?

content: This is a really good digital version of the game.  Plays well both with AI and online.  Only problem is that I waste too much time playing this when I should be doing other stuff!
Really well done. Could tone down some of the flashier bits in favour of a quicker load.
Fixed and it's a really cute game. Love it.
replyContent: Thank you very much!

content: Very good digital translation of the board game

It still never shows opponents making moves, even after they sent another update. I play with family and they make moves and submit, but still shows my turn on my end. It's also really slow and choppy animation, and the pieces look much darker than before. It takes forever to load, feels like a really data-heavy game because of the UI being so clunky. I gave it 2 stars instead of 1 since they did reply to my last comment, so it feels like they are trying to fix it.
replyContent: Sorry for your bad experience. We fixed the bugs and the performance issues in the new update.

content: Results page no longer shows *Fixed
I've never played the board game version, but this digital version is easy to learn and had great controls. Lots of fun, both vs AI and other players.
Score doesn't show up anymore at the end of a local game. Haven't played a multi-player game yet, so I can't say if that is broken too. The send feedback option doesn't work either! Fix the game
replyContent: We patched it today. Please let us know if it is not working for you.

content: Great implementation of a great game.
buggy, cannot play
replyContent: We just released a patch for the current version.

content: Accurate electronic version of the tabletop game.
I recommend getting the physical game. My wife and I enjoy it a lot and even my 5 year old does a good job playing it. This is a great version of the game.

I played this delightful boardgame and was happy to see this app on sale for $0.99. I didn't like that it seems to require permission to access files.  It took me a few plays to recall the rules, especially the catch-up mechanism. The app feels like a smaller/travel version of the board game, but for a fraction of the cost.
replyContent:
Hello,
we need the permission to save games locally (eg. if you loose connection or play locally). No files are accessed other then our game files on your device. Hope that helps to understand the permissions needed.

content: I was fortunate to purchase on a discount and ended up playing 5 games right away,  haven't played the multiplayer yet but as of now it is my go to game.
Bought the physical game and couldn't find anyone to play with me. Now I play the AI and have a great time.
Thanks chzy
Right?

The game is as fun as the original boardgame version and this is why I give it 4 stars. However, the lack of in-game manual as well as a little bit awkward UI (and logo), at least for me, is why it is not 5 stars. Overall, this is a good game!
I own the board game and now the app.  Lots of fun to play and love the music that plays during the games.
Fun to play with my kids.
See above.
Cant even learn how to play crashes on tutorial
replyContent: Hello Richard, can you send us a bug report from within the App, please? We did not receive any other reports of the tutorial not working. Can you tell us, what exactly is happening? Thank you!

content: Well worth the money
Love the board game,  we play all the time.    Great app,  especially now that I can connect to gplay! If you are having trouble,  wipe your caches! Quick service too,  thanks guys!
replyContent: You are welcome! Glad you like it :)

content: Could you have a function that toggles between play and an entire piece map? I don't like sliding on the piece row and then forgetting the forecast for the next 12+ pieces.
Fun, simple idea with interesting play.
Good game
I own the board game and was so excited to get the app! Great game with great features. It's worth playing!
Works very well on phone.
Quite addictive.
Love playing solitaire, but it's great to always have on hand in case my husband and I have 15 minutes to wait.

App plays well and loads quickly.   Note: I would appreciate a way to turn the background off so i would have a less cluttered field of view. With a less cluttered field i can better analyze the patches.  Don't worry about a DLC bait and switch.
replyContent: Hi, did you try the classic version? It is free included and does not have animations in the background. Happy gaming!

content: Great app great game

the game seems simple and theme a bit silly but it has quite a bit of strategy to it and the graphics and game play are well done. definitely worth the price. i haven't played on a network yet so I can't comment on that. I've been playing the AI. i do wish the "hard" level was a bit more difficult. (and I wish the amount of buttons allocated to players in the beginning was a little more that way there would be more choice in the early part of the game; but that's a rules issue and not an app issue.) cheers
Great adaptation of a great little game. It takes a few games to wrap your head around how to play well. But you'll be scoring in the positive numbers in no time.

Much like the table top game which we've played countless times the app delivers the FUN whenever I want to play. Whether with a Friend or AI this game is in my hip pocket ready to go. Colorful & masterfully made and even a tutorial that would help the newbie jump right into play. Definitely worth 5 stars.

I found the app very good and well designed. The minor drawback that i find is that when i chose a tile and haven't patched it in the board, i would like to put it back in case i made a mistake or misclicked it. Please put an undo option.

Good game. But the app is not good. First off, if I lose a network connection (which happens a lot on the subway) a prompt pops up that you can't dismiss without hitting the OK button. WHICH SHUTS OFF YOUR GAME. Horrible! Also, what kind of crap app forces you to listen to the game music loop and doesn't allow your own music to continue? This POS app. It'd also be nice to have an undo button. People make mistakes. Oops I didn't mean to do that. Too bad. No undos.
Lovely implementation of a very nice game
Great game!
Just as fun as the board game!
Can't recommend this enough
Well done with creating this version. The AI is just right for a quick game.
Can't see friends online to make a game...
replyContent: You have to search for them and add them as friend in your profile on the left in the menu. Once they have accepted your request they will appear in the list for friendly games.

content: Great game!!
Brilliant app

There is a bug that made one of my online games disappear in the middle of our game and actually unfriended us. I uninstalled then re installed it and finally showed the game but still had us unfriended and the game's time was up. Also the other games I had started with this player was not showing still on the other players side. Awesome game but the app verison needs a bug fix.

I have enjoyed this game for a while now. All of a sudden when I log in, half my games have been ended, apparently at my end, and the other person wins. But...I have not ended the game, any one got any ideas what is going on?

I love the board game but the app is such a great representation and with the AI, I can play whenever I want. I haven't tried playing with friends or strangers yet but it is pretty great on just what I've played so far!
A great implementation of a great 2 player game!
I'm a big fan of the original board game, and this app is an awesome digital version.
AI on Hard is a decent opponent. Super good GUI.
This really is a mind wracking strategy game for two. Top notch, despite the atrocious theme.
Some custom games do not show up in the games menu. Usually happens when invited to the game.
replyContent: Hi Joe, Thanks for your feedback. The custom game system will be revised in the next patch. Custom games will be more clearly represented.

content: Just like the real board game!
easy game. fun. replay value.
I have wanted to play Patchwork for a long time.  It has lived up to my expectations. I am going to have to get the table top version now.
The game itself is beautiful but the app can be extremely buggy. I find myself regularly having to kill the app and restart it to get the game to continue. Mostly buggy with the online stuff.

I'm totally addicted to this game. It would be just fun if it were just you vs. the AI (easy, medium, hard), or you vs. a local friend, sharing a device. But the fact that you can have multiple games going against all sorts of people of many levels of play is great! Especially since they make it so easy to see when it's your turn on new games and go to the "next game" right from the one you're on.   I've had some minor glitches, but mostly this works perfectly and I'm getting much better at the game as I play so many people with different strategies.
Connection error with Google Play - getandroidauthtoken android fail.
replyContent:
Hi Jacqueline,

Could you check if you have the newest Google Play Services installed? If the problem continues please write us to support@digidiced.com

content: Addictive!
Best!
Just wish I could save my completed patchworks somewhere.

It's a fun little strategy game that's good to pass the time. I'm glad you aren't forced to play against other players, though the AI can be pretty dumb (such as flipping pieces that dont change at all when flipped). My friend told me about this game, and I just happened to get a prepaid card for my birthday so I decided why not! I think 4$ for a little game like this is a fair price, especially considering how potentially competitive it can be!
Flawless adaptation of the board game
Very good digital representation of the board game!
A good version of the board game
One of my new favorite games
Love playing it with my 9 year old daughter.  We have now ordered the board game as well and can't wait for it to arriveüòä

App needs a way to play online in a timely manner. 24 hr turns is boring and makes for games that take too long and you forget what you had planned to do next turn. If instead you played a game in one sitting and had 1 minute turns, I'd be much happier. This would make the app more like the board game and would make the rankings mean more.

The game is great, but I can only play local games.  If I attempt to connect to my play account I get the following error-  Login Error: GetAndriodAutToken, android fail.  Would rate higher if it wasn't broken.
replyContent:
Hi Todd, 
Thanks for your report. Could you check if you have the newest Google Play Services installed? If the problem continues please write us to support@digidiced.com

content: The Patchwork app faithfully reproduces the board game while adding some neat artwork and visuals. Love it!
The game is still having quite a few glitches when you have more than four games active in the queue, but with that said, it's an excellent adaptation of the board game.
The game is fantastic but it needs a harder setting.
Game is making my phone overheat. Seems to be a memory leak. Please fix asap
Regardless of playing the physical version this implementation allows user to learn game. The AI is not the greatest but works for bathroom breaks;)
Uwe Rosenberg does an amazing job designing games. Nice to try something a little more simpler.
Cute game
Brilliantly digitised. Well worth picking up.
Love it. My new #1 game on my phone!
Have the board game and loved it - this is a perfect version of board game without mess of picking up pieces! A great game to escape the stressors!
Overall this is wonderfully done, capturing the spirit of the game. The tutorial could use some work though. It isn't as intuitive as it should be for players who've never played the board game.
The interface animations can be a little slow, but this captures all the good parts of the boardgame.
Played this awhile ago at a board game cafe and had a great time, and this app does a perfect job of recreating the game, and requires no space and no set up. Very glad I found this!
As promised 5 out of 5. And thanks for fixing the buy. You guys are awesome.
replyContent:
Hi Srijan,
thanks for that tip! We fixed this issue in the latest patch.

content: Excellently executed simulation of the tabletop game.
Superb fun. AI sucks and it would be nice if the game rules were available just to read.
replyContent: Hi Dan. You can look up the rules here: http://lookout-spiele.de/wp-content/uploads/Patchwork_Rules_US.pdf

content: Great new game. Would recommend this app. I'd like to see optimisation for the login process. I find it odd that I have to manually log in every time I want to play multi-player. The new auto pass feature in multi-player is much appreciated as it improves game flow :)
A lovely game.
The bugs are a little frustrating, but the multiple play modes are nice and the game is fun. Would like to see the bugs fixed and maybe some new (and better designed) DLC choices.
Great game and app!

Get a few bugs from time-to-time that cause me to be unable to buy pieces I should be able to buy, or which cause me and my opponent to switch turns for no reason, or which misreprents the number of buttons my opponent has. Also, there's not as much activity online as you might want. Otherwise, a solid game.
Great adaptation
Being able to see the current score, adds tactical depth. A fun and fast game.
Stellar implementation of a great board game

Whatever hppened was solved in the latest version. It works great now. Thanks!!!                    I installed it yesterday and tried to play 3 times. I got the same message telling me "Unfortunatelly patchwork has stopped"  all of the times. It doesn't work. Can I get my money back or can it be fixed? Thanks in advance.
replyContent: Hi Edi, I'm sorry that you can't start Patchwork. Please contact info@digidiced.com for further assistance.

content: Amazing game, and now that autopass is here things move much faster.
I think this is a great game.

I really like this game.  But I just bought that kawaii skin and while the background is nice the fabric choices are really bad. You end up with a mish mash of eyes and ears. And the eyes are easily mistaken for buttons. I can think of half a dozen cuter ideas off the top of my head...in fact being able to design/upload your own skins would be great.
Best digital version of a board game I have purchased.  Well done.

Occasional glitches, but usually fixed fairly quick. Also, battery drains pretty fast during Casual Play. Love the ranked games, don't quite understand how the ELO scores are figured, but fun to be able to play with other people. Iron out all the glitches, and rating will be 5 star!
replyContent: Hi Shaea, bugs should all be fixed. Please let us know, if we can do anything else. :)

content: Patch fixed my the issue I was having. App works great now. Changed review to 4 stars.
replyContent:
Hi William,
I'm very sorry you experienced this bug. We had a major bug with version 14 on Thursday that got fixed last Friday in version 15. Try updating to the latest version to fix the error. Hope this helps!
Cheers

content: Not overly easy but fun. Still trying to figure it out

The game is unique and interesting and the developer is lovely. I was getting an error playing the game online and emailed them. Got a reply a few hours later with advice and they offered a refund if it didn't fix the problem. Good game, great dev
Beautifully done.

It's two player Tetris! And it's fantastic. The mechanics are fairly simple, but the strategies are varied. You can go for a button win by gathering all the money making pieces, try to stump your opponent, or simply fill in your entire board. The asynch works really well, too.
Thanks to a swift response from the developer. It seems my earlier connection problems were due to server maintenance.
replyContent: Hi Phil King, the game services were offline for maintenance. It should be online again. Sorry for any inconvenience and thanks for your patience.

content: love the game, online play is great!
replyContent: Hi Scott Pendleton, the game services were offline for maintenance. It should be online again. Sorry for any inconvenience and thanks for your patience.

content: Great customer service fixing error I was having
replyContent: Hi Joe Spano,  the game services were offline for maintenance. It should be online again. Sorry for any inconvenience and thanks for your patience.

content: The game is fun but it refuses to log in with my Google play account so I can't play against people.
replyContent: Hi Kaleigh O, the game services were offline for maintenance. It should be running again. Sorry for any inconvenience and thanks for your patience.

content: Great game, smooth gameplay, polished look.
Fun game for two that doesn't constantly beg me to buy things.
I have been playing this nonstop since I got it, and now most of my friends are playing as well. It's  an excellent game.

Love the game. Highly recommend it. I just completed a blanket with no squares missing for the first time, and in doing so went over a single square patch on the time chart. Since there was no place to put it, the system didn't know how to respond and froze in sewing mode. :-( Still love the game though!
replyContent: Hi Benjamin, Thank you very much for your kind words. The single patch on a full blanked issue is fixed in the next version which is already waiting for approval.

content: So I love this game, and the app is great, but I ran into an issue: I filled my board while crossing the last one tile patch. Initially the piece, a 2 by 2 square, placed fine and upon receiving the one tile piece I couldn't place it or discard it so I couldn't finish my turn. Then when I left the game and came back, it showed the area where I put my last piece as empty and has me place the one tile piece but gives me a network error when I try. I can't finish the game because I played too well, I guess.
Fantastic implementation of a great 2 player board game.  One of the best digital board games available on Android.
I really enjoy this game. Pretty smooth game play and lovely graphics. I wish the AI was a little more difficult but that's a minor qualm.
Fun solo, but every time I try to start a casual game with friends I get an error about Android authtoken. And when I tried to send a bug report, I got the same error!

I love how many play options there are (3 difficulty levels of ai, the option to play in person, and online play matchups). It makes the game playable for a wide variety of skills sets both on and offline. I play on buying a copy of the physical game when I have a chance, but the phone version is incredibly entertaining and I see it holding my attention for a long time. I'm also extremely relieved that they fixed the bug from the previous version (and quickly).
replyContent:
Hi Catherine,
I'm very sorry you experienced this bug. We had a major bug with version 14 on Thursday that got fixed last Friday in version 15. Try updating to the latest version to fix the error. Hope this helps!
Cheers

content: Plays quick, fun. Cute visuals. Also not having to math up the negative score at the end on the app is awesome
Faithful conversion. Really enjoyable, 15 minute games with a decent AI. Solid purchase.
Wonderful

This is, in my opinion, the best two-player board game I've ever seen. The app is also outstanding when it works. My only concern was a lockout bug (since fixed) and occasional issues regarding failure to acknowledge when it's your turn.
See title
This app plays great for both pass & play and online. The only thing it could use is a harder AI.
Excellent game. I love both the board game and the app version.
replyContent:
Hi Tina,
I'm very sorry you experienced this bug. We had a major bug with version 14 on Thursday that got fixed last Friday in version 15. Try updating to the latest version to fix the error. Hope this helps!
Cheers

content: Lovely and cool game to play !

My wife and I have a blast with this simple yet devious game. Meaningful choices without overwhelming possibilities; A soothing theme with competitive undercurrents. "Wanna play a quick round of cutthroat quilts? üòâ"
Great implementation of a great game!
Game is great. App is buggy.

Update 2:  thanks to the friends at digidice for personally responding to my problem.   All is working now. tried to reinstall.   It downloads and gets caught in a cycle of installing.  It still won't work.   Error code 963. ."The app cannot be updated".   This is the response I still get after the supposed fix for the error. It successfully downloads through two downloads and says the app can't be updated. It still says I bought a trial version when I bought the full game. I'm on a galaxy note 4.please fix
replyContent:
Hi Heath,
sadly this is a play store error and we cannot do anything on our end. Try the following steps to solve the issue. I hope it helps: http://www.fixerrs.com/2015/07/google-play-store-error-963.html
Update: If the fixes in the link don't work, you can try deleting the updates of the play store app. That usually fixes the problem.

content: Addicting!

content: Purchased the app a week ago - eerything was fine, a little slow and glitchy with loading but it still worked. Now when I open it, a pop-up comes up saying that the "test version" has expired and I need to purchase the app. Uh, what? Please fix, or refund our money. :(
replyContent:
Hi Anna,
I'm very sorry you experienced this bug. We had a major bug with version 14 on Thursday that got fixed last Friday in version 15. Try updating to the latest version to fix the error. Hope this helps!
Cheers

content: I love this game! I bought it and play it almost every day. But today I got a message saying my test version expired and to buy the game? I already paid for this! Either give me my game or give me my money!
replyContent:
Hi Ashley,
I'm very sorry you experienced this bug. We had a major bug with version 14 on Thursday that got fixed last Friday in version 15. Try updating to the latest version to fix the error. Hope this helps!
Cheers

content: Love the board game and the app! Thank you
If a game based on sedentary quilting was considered the best choice option available, I'd like to see the ones that were considered not as exciting. But it WORKS!
It's great except is a little difficult to see all the pieces left to buy at a glance (you have to scroll through the line and more than likely end up "grabbing" pieces while doing it).
Even better since it can be played android vs ios.
Just like the board game, can't stop playing!

Don't let the cute kid-stitched owls fool you-- this is a cut-throat game of frustration and broken dreams from which only one quilter will emerge alive. Excellent app of a superb game. Really brings out the edge-of-your-seat thrills and tension of quilting (at least I assume so; I've never actually quilted).
replyContent: Well spoken! :) Glad you like it.

content: Error 963. Tries downloading and stops at 98%, retries and error pops out. Can't refund anymore either. EDIT: Unmounted SD card & was able to DL/install. Good game, no issues. Maybe could use an undo button for mistakes.
replyContent: Hi Kane, glad you found a way to resolve it. http://www.fixerrs.com/2015/07/google-play-store-error-963.html would have been my next best guess. Thank you for updating your rating.

content: All the fun of the original with a touch of glitch here and there.
My only complaint is the wheel of pieces not being as easily viewable as I would like
Fun but wish you didn't have to buy designs after paying for the game it should be included in price.
Fantastic!
replyContent: Hi Mike. We fixed this issue this morning. It was server/ELO related. High players were not matched as there were too few worthy opponents. It should work now. Sorry for the inconvenience - good hunting!

content: Addicted, as a serious boardgames I was skeptical at first but I love the game mechanic of it.. simple at first but then you discover more to it later on

Wonderful little 5 minute game which I love.  But a single 5 minute game is so addictive I usually end up playing 5 or 6 of them then 30 minutes has gone by!  Seriously, I have this for my Samsung s5 phone and iPad and it plays great on both.  Great job. Would not change a thing.  Update-you CAN have the AI go first if you drag the opponent name over on top of the Player 1 name which then gets moved to the second slot. Granted, I don't see a random player start but it's a challenge to start second.

Gameplay is great and very strategic. Menu is lacking and confusing, no option to randomize first turn in the game (you will always go first against AI), and it freezes a lot. I would love to give 4* but the freezing is too frequent. Also, sometimes encounter problem where one piece cannot be picked up, even though I have the buttons for it.
replyContent: Hi Jean, we are working on the freeze issue - unfortunately it is a random bug we have to find the source of. Besides that you can already change who goes first. Just drag the AI player on the first slot and yourself on the second. Hope that helps. Update is coming for the freeze. Thank you!

content: Good little game either against AI or online. One of the few games I've actually paid for...
Great app all around.
Good strategic 2 player game with simple rules but deep consequences to one's choices. Good app implementation too. I've been convinced to buy the physical version.
Even though this isn't perfect yet they seem to be on top of fixing things and responding to user feedback right away. Great, super cute digital implementation of patchwork!
A seriously fun brain teaser grounded in tabletop games. Would have liked a portrait mode or a small screen mode with larger buttons and text.
!! ! üòä
The game is a nice adaptation of the real one. It just need more polish on the menus (there are no labels, just cryptic icons) and ui responsiveness
And it will make you  better player for when you play the real thing.
Love playing modern boardgames on my phone and tablet. Helps me get bye until I'm able to get together with friends and family with the real table top gameüòä‚ò∫
Same feel as board game
I have the boardgame and play regularly with my daughter and this replicates it so well.  Now when we go out we can play anywhere.

Overall brilliant execution and artwork true to the spirit of the board game. I used to be unable to connect Google Play Games to it on my OnePlus X. I uninstalled all the updates for it and now the game connects. Early bugs have been quashed very swiftly. Delighted with my purchase. I bought all themes to reward and support the developers.
Another Uwe hit well implemented
Wonderful implementation, slightly hampered by the lack of a "jump to next game" button (instead you need to go out to the main menu, jump back to your games list and then select.

It looks great, and now it even logs in to Google Play!. The developers have been very responsive, and I am quite confident that they will work out any problems that may crop up. At first, it was fatally buggy for me, then they patched some of those problems, and now it all seems to work just fine!. Thus, the rating is up from ‚òÖ‚òÜ‚òÜ‚òÜ‚òÜ to ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÜ‚òÜ to ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ!
replyContent: Hi Nathan, we fixed more bugs and if you still have trouble with Google Play it is most likely something local as many thousand games are being played right now :). Hope you will enjoy the next feature update.

content: Inspired me to get the physical copy. Graphics are cute. I like the adjustable game speed and ai.
Patchwork is one of my favourite two player, and with this app I have finally been beaten in a game!
Uninstalled google play updates: problem solved! Thanks for the tip. Love this game.
replyContent: Hi Mike, your error can have 3 causes - 1. SD card full 2. clean your cache 3. Play Store Version. I found this link: http://www.fixerrs.com/2015/07/google-play-store-error-963.html  which may help you.

content: This would easily get 5 stars if they fixed some of the clunkiness of the menus.  Why do I have to press 5-6 presses to get to the next online game that has a turn ready for me?  Also, please randomize first player when playing against AI.
Great game but it drains battery power on both my phone and tablet. Both devices are also hot to touch whilst playing.
Wanted to try this before getting boardgame. Like this better, honestly.
Excellent implementation of a great board game

Uwe Rosenberg is a top tier game designer and Patchwork is just another example of his brilliance. Take Tetris, make it competitive and look good, then go and tweak it with some simple changes to the formula and you have this beautiful game. Then Digidice come along and convert it to one of the most appealing conversions ever. This is a killer app. Buy it now!
Wooot
Excellent app, tutorial is great, great port of an incredible board game. Cross platform multiplayer is fantastic.
Excellent app for an excellent game.
This game is fun and they did a great job making it an app.  Thank you for not overlooking android like a lot of other companies.
Not the best game ever, but it's there.
Fab game. Once you get the hang of it can't stop playing!
There are only a few bugs in the game, but overall it's a great app and I love the game!

Plays great, if a bit slow. I encountered a bug where the patch was chosen but I got it to zoom out to the play area and I couldn't place the patch. The placement buttons were visible but I couldn't navigate the patch to where I wanted, so had to abort the game.
Love the game play... Any way to let computer go first? Also, would love a higher level of difficulty!
Great port
Love the board game and this app is a great translation of the experience.  We'll done.
Good implementation of a fun game.
Game is unplayable because the pass does not work
replyContent: Hi Grisham, did you update the game to the newest version? We fixed quite some bugs since last week. If you still would like a refund, please write us an email.

content: The board game is fun and light, even lighter than Carcassonne. Good implementation. UI is elegant and AI seems smart.
I am a fan of some of Uwe's other games but had never played this one before. The tutorial was quick and got the important points across and the UI is lovely. Well done!

Patchwork is one of my top two player board games and this app implements it really well. Adorable graphics and music. In app purchases are only aesthetic. A few bugs to work out, but the response of the developers is excellent! Seems to eat at my battery rather quickly or maybe that's because I'm playing constantly :) Great asynchronous online play, I can't stop playing it!
I love the board game version and this does a great job of capturing the feel.
replyContent: Great! Thank you for your rating! New update coming soon :)

content: Very well adaption from the boardgame!
Great fun! No excessive IAPs. THANK YOU!
Niiiiice!
... with excellent developer support.
replyContent: Thank you for your update! Awesome customer's support! :)

content: I love the Patchwork board game, and this app is a great version of it. Really fun and pretty adorable.
Just  3 months after le havre, another excellent digital port of a fine boardgame. Fully featured and with entirely optional IAP. 5 stars.
Fun puzzle game
Now I can play against a proper opponent instead of just the 1-player variant with the physical version.

Really well made app. The music sounds great, and easy to use ui. I had no issue playing on my phone. I wanted to try the mobile before buying the physical copy. Seems like a great board game and will probably purchase it in the future.
Excellent game, and a great way to try it out before getting the physical version, but desperately needs desktop notifications or I have to keep checking in

Works well single player,  but when I've just played 2 player local the buttons weren't working, all the buttons were spent from player 1 and given to player 1, none from player 2, and although it let us spend the correct amount (I was on -4 buttons at one point) it did not display the correct amount so was hard to plan your moves.
replyContent: Hi Sammi, please update your version, the bug you are describing is long gone :)

content: Glad these kinds of games are making it to android.
There was a login problem with Google play. This was due to Google however.  The AI version is great and user interface is easy and intuitive. Starting to explore the online play now.
replyContent: Hello Richard, this seems Google Play related. You could try to downgrade to the last Google Play version. As the newest one is bugged as other games are having a lot of trouble with it, too. Hope that helps! Cheers

content: While the adaptation is great, mostly, despite an overloaded interface, the game simply won't log me in Google Play, so I cannot play it online. And on top of that, it crashes after a game. It is very rough on its actual state. EDIT: It seems to be a problem with Google's app so reverting app to its original rating. Were the interface cleaner, it would be a straight 5/5

This is a really fun little game. The only complaint is with the local game with guest it does not pull the buttons from both players only the first player side. Please address this and it will be great overall.
Easy to learn. Fun to play.

I hadn't played the game until buying the app, buy the tutorial was understandable and effective. Usually, app versions are hard to get into without prior knowledge of the rules and whatnot, but this implementation works great.
A very good implementation.

So far, it's great. I love the little embellishments like sewing the pieces into place. I've only played online so far, it's been easy to search for & add friends, and I appreciate the multi-platform play. I do wish that my profile would stay logged in, however. I'm having a 'Login' screen pop up to tap every time I go to the profile screen (and I have to do this so I can get to my online games in progress, or their notifications don't show up).  I'd also appreciate a 'next game' button or something so I can scroll through turns without having to go back to a menu.   Overall it's a lovely implementation of one of my favourite games, and I'm glad I grabbed it! (And thanks to the devs for noticing my grumble on Twitter about the $4.49 price tag, which they said was an error, so I was able to pick it up for $3.99 when they fixed that. Awesome customer service.)
I have heard so many great things about Uwe's newest game. After trying it out with this app, I can see why.
So glad to have this game come to app form. A few minor bugs but what do you expect on the first day of release! I defo recommend this app :)
Game now works as advertised! Great implementation of the best 2-player game out there!
It is just as fun and addicting in the app as it is the analog version. Now with the app i can take it with me and play anywhere, :-)

I love the board game & seems to be at least playable in this app. However, in my opinion, this is textbook case of poor app design. 2D Vector graphics replace handdrawn charm of original. Busy textures & backgrounds obscure UI. Multiple screens & views for different actions make it very challenging to comprehend flow of game, and especially state of all current pieces and your opponent. Obscure "blanket factory" story muddies understanding of rules. Updates unlikely to fix. Sad. üòû Emailing dev re: 3D bug.
Captures the board game wonderfully. The animations are great. So many options, too!
Excellent job! Graphics are awesome, sound is very nice and fitting of this game, overall good job! Worth the money!
Very well done!
Just played through the tutorial and it's great! Yet to test the AI.
